title: Earrings, 1946-50-8-a,b, mid-19th century
creditline: Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes
description: Earrings with screw fasteners.  A shows child placing floral wreath on head and b shows a child smelling flowers, painted on circular plate surrounded by rose diamonds and gold frame; half-ring at the top, the other half cut away for the screws; ornament with pine cone at the bottom.  Screw fasteners are probably a later addition.

exhibitions.title: Jewelry: A Selection from the Cooper-Hewitt Collection
